description: Receive assignments from Slayer Masters to kill specific monsters, earning Slayer XP and access to unique drops.

trainingMethods.name: Turael Boosting (Point Boosting)
trainingMethods.notes: Used to quickly complete tasks for Slayer points, typically every 9 tasks before a milestone task from a higher master.

trainingMethods.name: Konar quo Maten Tasks
trainingMethods.notes: Awards Brimstone Keys for extra loot. Tasks can be challenging due to location restrictions.

trainingMethods.name: Duradel Tasks
trainingMethods.notes: Highest Slayer Master, assigns high-level monsters and bosses. Good for XP and profit.

trainingMethods.name: Barraging Dust Devils (Task)
trainingMethods.notes: Excellent Magic and Slayer XP when on task. Requires multi-target setup.

trainingMethods.name: Bursting Nechryaels (Task)
trainingMethods.notes: Great Magic and Slayer XP, good loot from superior Nechryarch.
